attributes.action: beware of civil unrest&make your mind up are you a capitalist P.M.or a socialist P.M.when times get tough
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Beware the civil unrest currently happening in Paris,and rightly so!!!
Who can have faith in any government that cannot bring itself to bail out services that benefit us all..ie NHS yet have the audacity to find endless tax payers to bail out banks that have been ripping off mister&misses public for decades,and to beware of what ex president GW Bush said  " i belive in capitalism,however these are difficult times " so our elected governments are capitalists when the going is good and socialists when the going is bad,so we petition the P.M. to reveal his true colours and let us know what type of government we got when we elected this Blair government are you SOCIALIST?or CAPITALIST?WE HAVE A RIGHT TO KNOW

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
